abstrac: Where design meets purpose - crafting compelling solutions to shape business success and change the communities around them.
bio:
In a competitive marketplace, standing out is the key to success. That's why a well-crafted brand strategy is vital to your business growth and should be a top priority.

A brand strategy provides clarity, differentiation, efficiency, consistency, and adaptability, allowing you to build a strong brand identity that resonates with your target audience and creates a loyal customer base.

That's where I come in. With a focus on strategic planning and branding, I will work with you to create cohesive solutions that look great and drive results.

The process begins by analyzing your business context, its needs, and the target audience. From there, I will develop a customized strategy to guide all design and development decisions. This strategy accounts for the industry, values, goals, and ideal clients. Once the branding strategy is in place, I will move on to the design phase. This step includes creating logos, color schemes, typography, and other design elements to give your brand a consistent and cohesive look and feel across all platforms. I can offer integrated services for marketing solutions, web development, and UI/UX design to optimize user experience, functionality, and customer conversion.

Don't settle for a cookie-cutter brand identity that blends in with the competition when you can stand out and take your business to the next level. 

Let's work together and create a legacy that will impact the world.

abstrac: theMTpage is an individual, veteran-owned sole-proprietorship. Owner: Mark Kartischko
bio:
Vision Statement: 

To empower others to achieve their goals.


Mission Statement: 

To provide professional, top-quality deliverables, utilizing a lifetime of skills, to empower others to excel.


Services Provided:

Instructional Systems Designer utilizing the ADDIE model as well as other paradigms.

Creation of publications ready for export for print, PDF, EPUB, INDD/IDML, as well as other formats.

Graphics Designer ready for export as an AI, PSD, JPEG, PNG, EPS, PDF, as well as other formats.

Layout Artist for books (print or EPUBS), curriculum materials, manuals, operating procedures, as well as other purposes, utilizing Adobe Creative Cloud.

Highly proficient in Microsoft 365, Word, PowerPoint, and Excel, ready to satisfy your needs.

I am Mark Kartischko and am fluent in Adobe InDesign, Photoshop, Illustrator, and Acrobat; as well as Microsoft Office 365 Word, PowerPoint, Excel, and Publisher. I have over 23 years’ experience as a graphic designer/desktop publisher and 20 years instructional design experience. I am well-trained in typography and color theory. Also, adept in working in various formats, format conversion, and can produce any desired format output.

I am meticulous, efficient, responsive, flexible, and honest with excellent time management skills. I earned a master’s degree in educational technology from George Washington University, bachelor’s degree in Workforce Education from Southern Illinois University, and an associate degree from Trident Technical College in Computer Graphics.

I’m here to serve. I'm here for you.

abstrac: Published writer and experienced policy analyst, providing high quality and engaging writing and editing for web and print. Recently moved back to San Francisco Bay Area.
bio:
My own articles have been published in major US and international newspapers and websites, including the London Guardian, the Huffington Post, the Philadelphia Inquirer and the San Francisco Chronicle. 

My strength is in writing about complex issues in a clear and engaging manner. When editing, I spot problems in clarity and consistency, and make suggested changes in the author's own tone and style.

Sample review:
From an Australian academic:
 “Lisa Nuss has been an amazing editor and proof-reader of my work for the last 4 years. Her work is always timely and impeccable. Her comments are to the point and very relevant, sometimes opening up a new perspective for me.  All of my articles were published in referred journals once proofed by Lisa. I would recommend Lisa to anybody who needs high quality results.”

Happy to negotiate hourly or bulk rates. I typically require the full amount deposited into escrow, with half released up front and half on completion; for longer projects we can do periodic payments.

abstrac: Expert in 3D Modeling, CAD Design and Architectural Rendering.
bio:
I have more than 12 years of professional experience with 3D Modeling, 3D Architectural Visualizations and Interior design works.

I have successfully executed 500+ projects till date, for my numerous satisfied clients.
My skill set include:
AutoCad, Sketchup Pro, Blender.
Vray, Adobe Aftereffects and Photoshop CC.

Available as needed from the client's end. Flexible working hours.
Accessible any time through Skype or Whatsapp.
